amendment.description: To clarify the payment terms under the Trade Sanctions Reform and Export Enhancement Act of 2000.

action.text: Amendment SA 282 proposed by Senator Craig to Amendment SA 281. (consideration: CR S3186-3188; text: CR S3186) To clarify the payment terms under the Trade Sanctions Reform and Export Enhancement Act of 2000.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 282 proposed by Senator Craig to Amendment SA 281.
